pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bootstrapping in Different One-Way and Two-Way ANOVA // To address the violation of the assumption of normally distributed variables, researchers frequently employ bootstrapping. Building upon established packages for R (Sigmann et al. (2024) doi:10.32614/CRAN.package.afex, Lenth (2024) doi:10.32614/CRAN.package.emmeans), we provide bootstrapping functions to approximate a normal distribution of the parameter estimates for between-subject, within-subject, and mixed one- way and two-way ANOVA.
